channel.title: Jeff Atwood / @codinghorror
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @codinghorror. Generated by nitter.net

item.title: Pinned: What if.. we re-built these two books, with the programs rewritten and rearchitected into well written examples of Ruby, Python, JavaScript, and http://VB.NET versions of each game? And of course we'd "publish" it through a website, with permission?
item.dc:creator: @codinghorror

description.p: What if.. we re-built these two books, with the programs rewritten and rearchitected into well written examples of Ruby, Python, JavaScript, and VB.NET versions of each game? And of course we'd "publish" it through a website, with permission?

item.title: RT by @codinghorror: Our ball of cuteness has grown to the size of a baseball, now weighing almost one pound. Keepers have named the rare southern three-banded armadillo pup Segway, after her parents Vespa and Scooter. Segway is the first healthy armadillo pup born at the Zoo in our 116-year history.
item.dc:creator: @PtDefianceZoo

description.p: Our ball of cuteness has grown to the size of a baseball, now weighing almost one pound. Keepers have named the rare southern three-banded armadillo pup Segway, after her parents Vespa and Scooter. Segway is the first healthy armadillo pup born at the Zoo in our 116-year history.

item.title: RT by @codinghorror: I opened an old tech book and this @codinghorror sticker fell out. Imagine some future antiques roadshow: “by analyzing the subtle differences in die to cut we determine its origin to be.” https://blog.codinghorror.com/coding-horror-stickers/ #ButDoYouHaveTheEnvelope
item.dc:creator: @wes

description.p: I opened an old tech book and this @codinghorror sticker fell out. Imagine some future antiques roadshow: “by analyzing the subtle differences in die to cut we determine its origin to be.” blog.codinghorror.com/coding… #ButDoYouHaveTheEnvelope

item.title: RT by @codinghorror: Because I’m vaccinated & boosted & take precautions, I don’t fear the virus. What I DO fear is that I, or someone I love, might need emergency medical care for something else & can’t get it because hospitals are stuffed w/people who foolishly-& selfishly-refuse to be vaccinated!
item.dc:creator: @davidaxelrod

description.p: Because I’m vaccinated & boosted & take precautions, I don’t fear the virus. What I DO fear is that I, or someone I love, might need emergency medical care for something else & can’t get it because hospitals are stuffed w/people who foolishly-& selfishly-refuse to be vaccinated!

item.title:
RT by @codinghorror: two separate brain structures. two different results. given everything we've learned about vision in the last two decades i find this absolutely fascinating.
i would speculate that this illusion is triggering the "if it fits i sits" response in cats. ref: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0168159121001258?dgcid=coauthor#bib0010
item.dc:creator: @matterpoetry

description.p:
two separate brain structures. two different results. given everything we've learned about vision in the last two decades i find this absolutely fascinating.
i would speculate that this illusion is triggering the "if it fits i sits" response in cats. ref: sciencedirect.com/science/ar…

item.title:
RT by @codinghorror: The Holy Grail of pinball is coming to both Pinball FX and Pinball FX3! Indiana Jones: The Pinball Adventure will be available on all platforms of Pinball FX3, in Pinball FX in the Epic Game Store along with the Williams Pinball app in March.
#IndianaJones
item.dc:creator: @zen_studios

description.p:
The Holy Grail of pinball is coming to both Pinball FX and Pinball FX3! Indiana Jones: The Pinball Adventure will be available on all platforms of Pinball FX3, in Pinball FX in the Epic Game Store along with the Williams Pinball app in March.
#IndianaJones

item.title: RT by @codinghorror: Omicron presents a tremendous challenge: do you go out and risk getting covid or stay on the internet and risk hearing people talk about NFTs

item.title: Random Google Nest tech support question. I have three Google Nest Max devices, why do two of them circle load spin forever when trying to use the camera? AFAIK they are all set up the same!
item.dc:creator: @codinghorror

description.p: Random Google Nest tech support question. I have three Google Nest Max devices, why do two of them circle load spin forever when trying to use the camera? AFAIK they are all set up the same!

item.title:
RT by @codinghorror: We created more TikTok automated accounts and told the app they were 13.
The algorithm served them tens of thousands of weight-loss videos within a few weeks.
The latest story in our @WSJ TikTok investigation: https://on.wsj.com/32f0MmI
item.dc:creator: @JoannaStern

description.p:
We created more TikTok automated accounts and told the app they were 13.
The algorithm served them tens of thousands of weight-loss videos within a few weeks.
The latest story in our @WSJ TikTok investigation: on.wsj.com/32f0MmI

item.title:
RT by @codinghorror: December is for shipping!
✨ My annual portfolio refresh https://lynnandtonic.com
A bit more fun with a browser you can resize. Firefox and Edge seem to handle this best, but you do you.
item.dc:creator: @lynnandtonic

description.p:
December is for shipping!

item.title: Good. Watch Dopesick. The intentional cruelty here is absolutely staggering, it is not any kind of exaggeration to call the Sackler family war criminals: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EzrLrUG2QVk
